title.native: 世界最高の暗殺者、異世界貴族に転生する
title.romaji: Sekai Saikou no Ansatsusha, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei suru
title.english: The World's Finest Assassin Gets Reincarnated in Another World as an Aristocrat

description:
The world's number one assassin has been reincarnated as the eldest son of a family of aristocrat assassins. In exchange for being reincarnated in another world, a goddess has imposed upon him one condition. "Kill the Hero who is prophesied to destroy the world."

This was to be the mission in his new life. The synergistic effect of the vast knowledge and experience he gained that made all manner of assassinations possible in the modern world, and the secret techniques and magic of the fantasy world's most powerful family of assassins turn him into the greatest assassin of all time.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: สุดยอดมือสังหาร อวตารมาต่างโลก
世界顶尖的暗杀者转生为异世界贵族
Pembunuh Terhebat di Dunia Reinkarnasi Menjadi Bangsawan Dunia lain
המתנקש הטוב ביותר נולד מחדש בעולם אחר בתור אריסטוקרט

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Spearplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of spears in combat.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

node.description:
__Real name:__ Asuka Kato (加藤あすか)

[Website](http://www.spacecraft.co.jp/yuuki_aira/)

A J pop singer attached to the company Lantis. She began her career in 2007 performing in [Yuki Kajura](https://anilist.co/staff/100077)'s [FictionJunction](https://anilist.co/staff/103691) as "FictionJunction ASUKA". She released her debut album- Reflection on July 2, 2008.

Non-anime roles:
Hom-kun in "Atelier Meruru" (VG) (Japanese)
Theme Song Performance (OP/ED) for "Root Double -Before Crime * After Days-" (Visual novel) (Japanese)

__Real name:__ Asuka Kato (加藤あすか)
